mapper.select: SELECT q.id,q.question,su.username questioner, (SELECT count(*) from like_question lq where lq.question_id=q.id and lq.del_flag=0 and q.del_flag=0) like_num, (select count(*)>0 from like_question lq where lq.question_id=q.id and lq.user_id=#{userId} and lq.del_flag=0 and q.del_flag=0) is_like FROM `question` q LEFT JOIN sys_user su on q.questioner_id=su.id and su.del_flag=0 where q.del_flag=0 ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 5
